__e: For the good of your eternal soul.
For that you traded your everlasting soul?
And if my immortal soul is lost to me, something yet remains.
Eternal God, God of our mothers and our fathers, our God, we come before you today not in sadness or despair, but in joy and in confirmation. We come affirming... Stop it!
I command thee, in the name of the eternal God and Jesus Christ, our savior, to speak your name and declare from whence thou cometh!
I am thinking of your eternal life.
I have come to talk to you about Jesus and the eternal life.
Or if a man pledged his endless love to me.
... I know how you look at me as those who sit in the tubs ... and when the morning brings me the news, your unrequited love.
I stared death in the face a dozen times, and I did all that to be with a woman who chose a fierce and cruel man over my unconditional love.
